short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Steam Search. Start writing 'steam' and the game you are searching. You can also filter by OS. Extension created by Ale Mohamad.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now you can search for games on Steam from the Omnibox in Google Chromeâ„¢.
